message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, it has the potential to significantly enhance your operations and profitability. Given its exceptional capabilities, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This investment could be a game-changer for your business. Let's discuss how we can bring this innovative solution to your organization.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, my budget allows me to invest up to $1500000 for such a significant purchase. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000 for your product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise considering the capabilities you've highlighted. I look forward to your response.
